vision.title: 5 Documents Before One Line of Code
vision.subtitle: Every great product starts with a plan. We wrote five foundational documents before touching a single line of code.
vision.quote: Planning is not wasted time. It is compressed debugging.

items.title: Product Requirements
items.description: Defined the what and the why. Three personas, five checkpoints, clear success criteria.

items.title: Technology Research
items.description: Evaluated .NET 10, React 19, Vite 7 — locked versions before writing code.

items.title: User Scenarios
items.description: Storyboarded Sarah the freelancer, Marcus the team lead, and Diana the compliance officer.

items.title: Domain Model
items.description: Two bounded contexts designed upfront: Task (upstream) and Board (downstream conformist).

items.title: Development Guidelines
items.description: Naming conventions, layer rules, TDD methodology — the team's contract with itself.

journey.title: 5 Checkpoints, 5 Shippable Products
journey.subtitle: Every checkpoint shipped a complete, working application. Stop at any point and you have something real.
journey.insight: Every checkpoint ships a complete app. Stop at any point and you have something real.

checkpoints.title: Core Tasks
checkpoints.subtitle: CP1 — The Foundation
checkpoints.description: Full-stack CRUD with DDD from day one. Single-user mode, kanban board, list view, drag-and-drop.
checkpoints.decision: Column determines status — one source of truth

checkpoints.title: Auth & Security
checkpoints.subtitle: CP2 — Identity
checkpoints.description: JWT with HttpOnly cookies, user isolation, role-based access, security headers.

checkpoints.title: Rich UX
checkpoints.subtitle: CP3 — Polish
checkpoints.description: Dark mode, priority filters, task detail sheet, drag-and-drop reordering, loading skeletons, toast notifications.
checkpoints.decision: Sparse decimal ranks for O(1) card moves

checkpoints.title: Production Ready
checkpoints.subtitle: CP4 — Enterprise
checkpoints.description: Audit trail, AES-256 encryption, admin panel, i18n in 3 languages, Azure deployment, CI/CD, observability.

checkpoints.title: Delight
checkpoints.subtitle: CP5 — Experience
checkpoints.description: PWA with offline mutation queue, onboarding tour, Web Push notifications, analytics, mobile overhaul, landing page.
checkpoints.decision: IndexedDB mutation queue for offline sync

arch.title: Five Bounded Contexts, Zero Compromises
arch.subtitle: Clean architecture with strict layer boundaries. Every import direction is intentional.
decisions: Column determines status — one source of truth
Sparse decimal ranks — O(1) moves, no position drift
Result pattern, not exceptions — for business logic
AES-256-GCM encryption — protected data at rest

domains.title: Five Bounded Contexts, One Cohesive System
domains.subtitle: Each context owns its invariants. Domain events flow between them. Zero coupling, total cohesion.
domains.insight: The secret isn't microservices — it's clear boundaries. Each context could be extracted into its own service without changing a single domain class.

task.name: Task
task.description: The heart of the system — owns task lifecycle, priority, tags, due dates, sensitive notes, and archiving.

board.name: Board
board.description: Conformist to Task — owns spatial placement with columns, card positions, and drag-and-drop ordering.

identity.name: Identity
identity.description: User authentication with JWT, HttpOnly cookie refresh, role hierarchy, and AES-256 encrypted personal data.

admin.name: Administration
admin.description: Immutable audit trail for every security action, protected data redaction, and user management.

notification.name: Notification
notification.description: In-app alerts, Web Push via VAPID, due date reminders, and welcome messages for new users.

tech.title: Built With the Best Tools
tech.subtitle: Cutting-edge stack, locked to specific versions, chosen for production readiness.
